p: In response to the 2019-nCoV epidemic, the McGovern Institute for Brain Research of the Massachusetts Institute of Technology announced on February 14, 2020, that the team of Professor Feng Zhang, the inventor of SHERLOCK technology, used synthetic COVID-19 RNA to design two crRNA recognition specific sequences for S and Orf1ab ( 96). If the test paper is immersed in the preliminary purified nucleic acid sample for 2-3 min, the presence of 2019-nCoV nucleic acid is determined by the appearance of black lines on the test paper ( 96). However, since CRISR technology has always had patent disputes, the implementation of CRISPR-based molecular diagnostic technology can be challenging from an economic perspective.
